name: Listened to Dear Internet Episode 82: Anime Boyfriend

content.html:
Dear Internet, On this week’s show we talk about where magical creatures come from and how to deal with your SO’s anime crush. We would greatly appreciate if you could leave us a 5-star review on your podcast app of choice! If you want more Dear Internet, please consider supporting us on patreon through Dear Internet. Sincerely, The coHosts- Nick, Jennifer, Michael, and Tim Lanning! Apple Podcast, Spotify, RSS – follow us on Twitter!

By Dear Internet
content.value:
